title: LF Gold5+ players for ranked team
body:
Hi best way is just to add me in game or just leave a message below. 
We are after pretty much any roles atm as our currently players dont mind filling.

replies.body:
G'day.
I main mid.
My champion pool is pretty big, but the champs I'm really comfortable on are: Leblanc, Xerath, Syndra, Zed.

Currently G4, but honestly, the SoloQ cancer is holding me back =].

Hi Punch

Spoke to you in game, great to have you onboard!
